title: 全部人同我入黎寫信去律師會投訴何君堯

replies.msg:
大家幫幫手，幾個律師朋友決定發起向律師會投訴何君堯。
Template係下面，裡面有佢同白衫人d相 /片。
一般市民都可以send去律師會投訴。

Subject: Complaint letter to Mr. Ho Kwan Yiu
Email: [url]info@hkba.org[/url]
內容: 請到以下網址copy
https://we.tl/t-MLtbusYoGm

正更正，何妖不是大律師，是事務律師。以下是HKBA的回覆。

Dear Madam/Sir,
We refer to your complaint.
As a professional body formed by barristers, the HKBA deals with complaints against barristers who are admitted to the Hong Kong Bar in accordance with the Legal Practitioners Ordinance. Since the subject as named in the complaint is a firm of solicitors and/or solicitors therefrom instead of practising barristers, we are unable to handle this complaint.
Please contact the Hong Kong Law Society for the procedure and further details concerning complaints against solicitors in Hong Kong:
Address: 3/F, Wing On House, 71 Des Voeux Road Central, Hong Kong
Telephone: (852) 2846 0500
Fax:: (852) 2845 0387
Email: complaints@hklawsoc.org.hk
Hong Kong Bar Association
LG2 High Court
38 Queensway, Hong Kong
先生/女士 閣下︰
就 閣下提出投訴一事，本會現予回覆如下。
本會是由大律師 (barristers) 所組成之專業團體，並依照《法律執業者條例》負責處理有關大律師的投訴。由於閣下所提述的投訴對象為律師行及/或當中的事務律師 (solicitors) ，他們並非執業大律師，故此本會無權處理有關他們的投訴。
有關投訴香港認許事務律師之程序及詳情，閣下可向香港律師會作進一步查詢：
地址：香港中環德輔道中七十一號永安集團大廈三字樓
電話：(852) 2846 050
傳真：(852) 2845 0387
電郵︰complaints@hklawsoc.org.hk
香港大律師公會
香港金鐘道38號
高等法院低層二樓
